short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can easily and quickly search on amazon.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension can search on Amazon.com ecommerce shop in a new chrome tab and help for faster access. The Amazon extension will open the Amazon search result page, when you click search button. The extension includes the popular Amazon links for example Today's Deals, Coupons, Gift Cards, Amazon live, Watchlist and Your Account.
